name: 3D Platformer (hemanthy)
description:
Proposed Modifications:

1. I will create one new level that showcases the enemies of the games along with doors and allows the player to get accustomed to the fundamentals of the game.

2. I will create another level with objects to climb upon and much more difficult obstacles (as the player is now accustomed to the enemies and techniques of the game).

3. In addition to another level (which I still have to storyboard), I will change the color theme of the player to be red and gold(somewhat similar to an iron man aesthetic) with the UI elements being a shade of blue(somewhat similar to Jarvis and Iron Man's UI).

Created by Hemanth Yalamanchili
